description: An insecure authentication mechanism in the safe_exec.sh startup script of Blurams Flare Camera version 24.1114.151.929 and earlier allows an attacker with physical access to the device to execute arbitrary commands with root privileges, if file /opt/images/public_key.der is not present in the file system. The vulnerability can be triggered by providing a maliciously crafted auth.ini file on the device's SD card.
